alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 7:43AM MDT until May 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Nepesta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Nepesta. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.5 feet, Minor Flood. Agricultural lands near Nepesta are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM MDT Friday the stage was 14.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 16.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on 05/21/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM MDT.
